title: Pro Manage
description: Built a task management app with features for organizing tasks, tracking progress, and sharing updates. Enabled task creation, editing, assignment, and deletion to enhance productivity.

title: Food Delivery Website
description: Built a food delivery app with features for browsing food items, placing orders, tracking deliveries, and secure payments. Added user profile management for viewing and updating information.

title: Wanderlust
description: Built a travel platform clone of Airbnb,  user profiles, and property listings to provide a seamless travel experience.

title: Planet App
description: Built a React app using the Star Wars API to display information about planets with a clean and interactive user interface.

title: Weather App
description: Built a weather app using React and Material-UI to display real-time weather updates with an intuitive and responsive design.
